string_key_done: The key has been successfully saved!

string_try_again: (Do you want to try again? (yes / 'other answer' is no)
console_color_set: You have successfully changed the console color scheme to #{0}
console_color_clear: You have removed the console color scheme
console_color_error: This theme not detected! The color theme will be removed...
key_auto_set_false: Now when logging into the application, you will not need to enter the access key again
key_auto_set_true: Now when logging into the application, you will need to enter the key on a regular basis
key_deleted: The access key for this session has been deleted, you will need to enter it again. (The application will close)
key_get_error: The program was recently started or the key was deleted, restart the program to get the key
reg_input_doctor_id: Enter the doctor's ID, if you find it difficult to write, specify - 0

reg_done:
You have successfully registered! Your login: {0}

login_password_error: Invalid login or password. Try again
login_input_error: Login cannot be empty! Try again
valid_input_name: Enter the full name {0} in Russian (Surname, First Name, patronymic)
valid_input_name_error0: The full name must be written in Russian and without additional characters, repeat the input
valid_input_name_error1: Enter full name separated by spaces
valid_input_date_error0: Invalid date. The date must be no later than today and no earlier than 01.01.1900
valid_input_date_error1: Invalid date format. The format should be (DD.MM.YYYY)
valid_input_tag_error: The tag should be in English layout without special characters (except for '-')
valid_delete_data: This action will permanently delete the data, do you agree to continue? ({0}) (yes / no <= (other answer))

access_key_error_0: The key installed in the settings file is invalid
